desc: 스파크 시 데미지 50% 증가&BB 발동에 필요한 BB게이지 감소&약점 속성 데미지 무효화&매 턴 HP 회복

dictionary.lore: A crystal that formed from the bonds shared by the Four Heroes of Palmyna, who sealed Cardes the Malevolent. Said to have come from the passage to the Underworld that opened during the fierce battle against Cardes, the crystal gives the protection of the Four Heroes to whomever possesses it. According to one theory, this crystal is believed to be a part of the sealed Cardes himself, housing the souls of the Four Heroes within.

name: 4전사의 인연
